This website is AudioEye enabled and is being optimized for accessibility. To open the AudioEye Toolbar, press "shift + =". Some assistive technologies may require the use of a passthrough function before this keystroke. For more information, activate the button labeled “Explore your accessibility options”.

# Joe Deets

 

[City Council](https://www.bainbridgewa.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=14)  
Title: Councilmember, North Ward  
Phone: 206-473-1864  
[Return to City Council Directory](https://www.bainbridgewa.gov/217/City-Council)  
[jdeets@bainbridgewa.gov](mailto:jdeets@bainbridgewa.gov)

# **About Councilmember Joe Deets**

## **Term Expires: 12/31/2025**

Since 2000, Bainbridge Island has been my family home. Our natural environment and sense of community makes it a wonderful place to live, raise children, and retire. As one of the two North Ward representatives, I will work diligently to preserve the special character of our island and use its natural resources responsibly.

For further details of my professional background, please visit my [LinkedIn page](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jwdeets).

**Conflict of Interest Declaration (PDF)**  
[2025](https://www.bainbridgewa.gov/DocumentCenter/View/19327/Joe-Deets---Conflict-of-Interest-Statement-2025)  [2024](https://www.bainbridgewa.gov/DocumentCenter/View/18448/Joe-Deets-Conflict-of-Interest-Statement-2024)  [2023](https://www.bainbridgewa.gov/DocumentCenter/View/17360)  [2022](https://www.bainbridgewa.gov/DocumentCenter/View/16105)  [2021](https://www.bainbridgewa.gov/DocumentCenter/View/14857/Conflict-of-Interest-Statement---Deets-2021) [2020](https://www.bainbridgewa.gov/DocumentCenter/View/13695/2020-Conflicts-of-Interest-Statement---J-Deets)  [2019](https://www.bainbridgewa.gov/DocumentCenter/View/11504/DEETS-JOE-COI-2019)  [2018](https://www.bainbridgewa.gov/DocumentCenter/View/9805)

## **Councilmember's Open Office Hours**

I have my office hours at CUPS Espresso, located at 123 Bjune Drive SE in downtown Winslow, from 10:00 am to 12:00 noon. Everyone is welcome to meet with me to discuss City business.

July 26th

August 16th

August 30th

Sept. 13th

Sept. 27th

Oct. 11th

Oct. 25th

Nov 1st 

Nov 15th

Dec. 6th
